properties.title: Cabane d'Ant√®me
properties.description: Overlooking the Val d'Illiez, the hut is situated in a picturesque spot just by a couple of small mountain lakes. It sits at the base of the steep walls leading up to the peak of Haute Cime, with a view over the Portes de Soleil area. Open from mid-June to the beginning of October, according to weather conditions.
